sentences: TEC Chair Gabriel Blanco (Argentina) reported on a meeting held in Bonn in September 2011, in which members had elaborated on modalities and procedures.
India, for the G-77/CHINA, suggested that the term of the TEC be extended by a year.
He urged adoption of modalities and procedure as soon as possible.
TANZANIA proposed that the TEC explore synergies with other MEAs, including the Stockholm and Basel Conventions regional centers.
Parties will take up the issue in a contact group.
